title: Henry Clays American System - called for

content.question: Henry Clay’s “American System” called for all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: a tariff for the protection of industry
internal improvements at national government expense
sale of federal lands to finance higher education
greater reliance on domestic financial resources
increased trade among the sections of the nation

content.answer: sale of federal lands to finance higher education

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
